tooltips.pause: Ensures that no new sessions are started on this server. This won't stop active sessions.
tooltips.remove: Stops all active sessions and removes the server.

modals.addServerNote: Keep in mind that added servers won't persist after Artemis restarts. Please add the new server entry in the Artemis configuration.
modals.addServerText: Please enter the URL of the LSP Server to add:
modals.confirmRemovalTitle: Are you sure you want to remove this server?

alerts.errorServerAdd: An error occurred while adding the new server
alerts.serverExisting: A server with the same URL is already included
